item.title: Paradox on Bloodlines 2: "We had a game we could do, but maybe not with the team we had" - GamesIndustry.biz
item.description:
1. Paradox on Bloodlines 2: "We had a game we could do, but maybe not with the team we had"  GamesIndustry.biz
  2. 'Bloodlines 3 [Will be] Done by Someone Else:' Paradox Is Done With Vampire: The Masquerade After Bloodlines 2 Debacle  IGN
  3. Bloodlines 2 is more "spiritual successor" than sequel to "a competently good game by 2004 standards", say Paradox  Rock Paper Shotgun
  4. Paradox boss says Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is doing well, it's "a bit more of an action RPG" and "people who have seen it talk about Dishonored"  Gamesradar
  5. Bloodlines 2 Tentatively Slated for First Half of 2025, But Paradox Intends to License Out a Potential Sequel  Wccftech

item.title: Sony will delist LittleBigPlanet 3 and its DLC on October 31 - Engadget
item.description:

  5. LittleBigPlanet 3 & All DLC To Be Delisted October 31 2024  Wccftech

item.title: Bethesda Design Director Addresses Fan Concern as Starfield DLC Shattered Space Plunges to ‘Mostly Negative’ Steam Review Rating - IGN
item.description:
1. Bethesda Design Director Addresses Fan Concern as Starfield DLC Shattered Space Plunges to ‘Mostly Negative’ Steam Review Rating  IGN
  2. "Players can explore like they used to in Fallout and Skyrim": How Shattered Space brings the "bespoke goodness" of past Bethesda RPGs to Starfield  Gamesradar
